segments.text: What's the matter with you ? You don't look well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing . Maybe it is just the weather . Rainy days often make me feel a little sad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I like rainy days . The moisture in the air is good for my skin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . But it is too cold today . I have to put on warm clothes and look stupid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me , too . At this time of the year , I often miss my home in the warm south .
segments.speaker: S1
